issue.title: [Doc] Add git rebase tips to the 'Contributing' page in the developer docs
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4429](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4429). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
A recent discussion on the listserv (link below) asked about how contributors should handle rebasing. It would be helpful if the tips made it into the developer documentation somehow. I suggest in the ["Contributing to Apache Arrow"](https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/ARROW/Contributing+to+Apache+Arrow) page—currently a wiki, but hopefully eventually part of the Sphinx docs ARROW-4427.

Here is the relevant thread:

<https://lists.apache.org/thread.html/c74d8027184550b8d9041e3f2414b517ffb76ccbc1d5aa4563d364b6@%3Cdev.arrow.apache.org%3E>
